name: Snails Can't Be Salty
description:
This is my first Game and I hope you enjoy playing my Game just like I enjoyed making it! also I made the art, music and soundeffects by myself, so feedback to these things would be appreciated.

Controlls:

A = Run Left.

D = Run Right.

Left Mouse Button(Lmb) = shoot.

Space = jump.

You shoot  in the direction that your curser points.
